thread.title: BRIEF-Hospital Corporation Of China To Issue Convertible Bonds In Principal Amount Of HK$468 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hospital Corporation Of China To Issue Convertible Bonds In Principal Amount Of HK$468 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - hospital corporation of china ltd

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Hospital Corporation Of China Ltd :
* CO TO ISSUE CONVERTIBLE BONDS IN TOTAL PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF HK$468 MILLION TO VANGUARD GLORY LTD
* ‚ÄçNET PROCEEDS FROM ISSUE OF CONVERTIBLE BONDS ESTIMATED TO BE ABOUT HK$467 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
